from scipy.optimize import minimize_scalar

def func(x):
    return -x * np.sin(x)

bounds = (0, np.pi)
res = minimize_scalar(func, bounds=bounds, method='bounded')
print((res.x, res.fun))?(2.7984, 1.4318)?(2.798, 3.387)?(2.7986, 0.3589)?(1.30641, 2.04685)?(1.570796327, 2.02833317)?(1.2247448713915897, 0.7205806417300553)?(3.0, -2.79839)?(2.79839, 1.81243)
